data.name: FAE POPULI
data.detailed_description:
“The beautiful and the bizarre. The gorgeous and the grotesque. The terrible and the terrific. They all blossom from the very same source.”

Fae Populi is the tragic tale of a fae, who lives in the beautiful, yet dangerous world of Alma. In her journey, Pom will face fae, foes and rivals, all aiming for the same goal as her – to win the League and have her ultimate wish granted by the Evil Queen.

During her journey, Pom will learn about the lives and struggles of her adversaries and some of the secrets of her world, while being forced to rediscover secrets and memories about her own life, self and past – memories she would rather keep buried deep within her own soul.



The fae can temporarily evolve into more powerful forms, called Ancestor Avatar. Some fae can one step further and evolve into their Ancestor Unleashed form.

Fae have their own unique SMILE each, where their personal traits and signature abilities are stored. Pom can acquire new SMILE from the Echoes and Chefs she defeats during her journey through the League, as well as some special ones by finishing specific quests. When she acquires a new SMILE, she can unlock a new ability – similar to Pokémon TMs. When she uses an ability granted by another fae’s SMILE, the Echo of the respective fae will briefly appear to cast the ability for you.

Each SMILE has the picture of their respective Fae or Ancestor engraved on them. For example, the Aqua Templar SMILE has a picture of Pom and the evolved form of Pom’s SMILE has the picture of Pom’s Ancestor, Anemone. Additionally, abilities can be improved; Most of them have two levels, while some have three. Base level abilities tend to be weak, or have drawbacks.



Pom – The cute fae who aims to be the Evilest of All villains. She has her own warped vision of what a villain is. Pom enters the League in an attempt to stop a friend from committing a huge mistake.

Petra– A mysterious fae who appears in Pom’s memories from time to time. Who is this cutie, really?

Zia – The outwardly bad-mannered (but inwardly very sweet) fae who wants to learn more about the FOE, Chefs and the League, in hopes of finding a cure to a disease that plagues her hometown. She is Pom’s first rival.

Chá – An overly depressed fae who claims she will collect all SMILEs and free the fae who are trapped within them. No one knows exactly what she is talking about. Also, she is Pom’s second rival.

Zucchini – The mysterious self-proclaimed hero who saves Pom and unknowingly sets Pom in her journey.



Dr. Buni - Everything but the music and plugins.
L-ONE-X - Soundtrack!

L-ONE-X - Soundtrack!
data.short_description: FAE POPULI is a JRPG that tells the story of Pom, the fae who dreams of being the Evilest of All Villains, yet finds herself fighting to stop a friend from succumbing to a terrible fate.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 / 7 / 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 / 7 / 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
